root.name: Ec-Clem AUTOFINDER
root.description: Automatic registration in 2D or 3D based on detection or binary mask.
root.author: perrine - Perrine Paul-Gilloteaux
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2017-08-18 11:24:17
- fixed a bug on checkbox "export to ec-clem" for preparing data for further registration or analysis in EC-CLEM
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2017-04-11 12:25:34
- use new 3D ROI icy - Message can be removed (do not show again)
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2017-03-24 18:41:08
-- Add a new option to go on the registration with ECCLEM, allowing to then performed NONRIGID transformation from the automatically paitred points, or to generate error maps.
-- SAVE paired and matching Rois in csv files , in installation directory of icy
-- remove the limitation to 100 um of maximum distance
- Version 0.0.2.1 Date 2016-12-13 13:44:10
- propose automatically to set the maximum distance to about 10 pixels ( biggest pixels), expressed in micrometers --remove the limit of 10 um for maximum distance
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2016-11-30 05:42:57
- Modify ConvertbinarytoRoi so it can take Rois as well as inut (in addition to binary images), plus allow a resampling at the desired resolution. - Autofinder: changed the ransac procedure such that sampling are unique + distance-based. - bug correction on the find candidates - set few rules to avoid too few points to be matched.
- Version 0.0.1.6 Date 2016-11-08 11:53:31
- Add an interactive metadatacheck (as it is very important for autofinder) - Add the version number at the beginning
- Version 0.0.1.5 Date 2016-10-16 22:47:03
-correct typos.
- Version 0.0.1.4 Date 2016-10-02 11:54:19
-corrected an inversion in the wizard
- Version 0.0.1.3 Date 2016-10-01 18:05:16
- made the computatio more robust - Add a wizard tool
- Version 0.0.1.2 Date 2016-08-08 11:06:57
- Made it compliant with Java 1.6 >. - Added 2 parameters to adjust registration, also in block for protocols. - Corrected the matching process
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2016-08-04 15:20:01
non beta
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2016-08-04 15:04:26
